TestGroupDocumentation.Title: pattern2 Validate Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the on-demand validator of trees got by unmarshalling of a pattern-2.xsd based XML document and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a int restricted SimpleType with pattern value "\-\d{5}".

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML int pattern-2.xsd, validate unmarshalled then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls pattern-2-1.xml document which specifies valid value -88648 for the int restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-int-pattern-2 element, sets the values: -99999, -10000 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML int pattern-2.xsd, validate unmarshalled then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls pattern-2-1.xml document which specifies valid value -88648 for the int restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-int-pattern-2 element, sets the values: -100000, -9999, -999, -99, -9, 0, 9, 99, 999, 9999, 32767 and expects validation to fail.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML int pattern-2.xsd validate dynamically created then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of int restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-int-pattern-2 type, sets the values: -99999, -10000 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML int pattern-2.xsd validate dynamically created then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of int restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-int-pattern-2 type, sets the values: -100000, -9999, -999, -99, -9, 0, 9, 99, 999, 9999, 32767 and expects validation to fail.
